name: A Tuft of Heather
description:
Do you remember what happened that day? I know this may all seem strange at first. But you are here for a reason. We both are. We all are. Why did you do it? Or do you not care? 

A Tuft of Heather is a text-based psychological horror experience where you must guide the player through a abandoned old hospital as they must come face to face with their past. 

Y O U W I L L N O T F O R G E T 

rupesir vies
